ygData.subject: The End Is Near...................................................
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintissa and Artist look at each other sadly. Why would Dracona do this? She couldn t be reprogrammed, she had a device that could prevent it. Plintissa knew

Plintissa and Artist look at each other sadly. Why would Dracona do this? S=
he couldn't be reprogrammed, she had a device that could prevent it. Plinti=
ssa knew that her only friend was against her.

"Artist, we have to go back=
 and try to convince Dracona." Plintissa said.

"I agree, we must face dang=
er, and not flee. Oops." Artist said. Plintissa snickered.

"It's okay, Art=
ist, if you have to rhyme, then rhyme." Plintissa said. Artist smiled and b=
oth of them returned to Team Ultima's base.

Dracona looked to Train Wreck.=


"YOU! What are you doing?" Dracona yelled. Train Wreck smiled.

"Stealing=
 your equipment, what does it look like?" Train Wreck said. Dracona growled=
.

"I thought I reprogrammed you!" Dracona said.

"Yeah? I used your own in=
vention against you! And I used it on my friends, too!" Train Wreck said. A=
rrow stepped up by Train Wreck. They both looked at Blender and Stronghold.=
 B;ender walks up. Stronghold does. Stronghold reaches out and grabs Train =
Wreck, forcing him down and sticking a rifle to the back of his head. Blend=
er grabs Arrow and drags him down as well.

"Sorry old friends, but Dracona=
's deal is a BETTER deal!" Blender said.

"Outside, I don't want any blood =
in the base."  Dracona said. Train Wreck and Arrow were drug outside. Train=
 Wreck suddenly lurched out and hit Blender. Stronghold was hit by Arrow, w=
ho had escaped. Stronghold and Blender chased Arrow and Train Wreck into th=
e jungle. Stronghold struggles with Train Wreck. Arrow is hit so hard by Bl=
ender he is put into stasis lock. Train Wreck is beat senseless by both of =
S.A.B. Inc. (Stronghold and Blender Incompany.) Train Wreck tries all of hi=
s submissions but Stronghold and Blender always save each other. Train Wrec=
k is held in the air by Stronghold. Blender laughs. Train Wreck is almost d=
ead, his mech fluid is flooding the jungle and is almost drowning Arrow. Bl=
ender pops a spinning saw blade from his forearm and slams it through Train=
 Wreck. Stronghold drops Train Wreck and laughs. Blender reaches down and s=
naps Train Wreck's neck. Blender and Stronghold bow to each other and turn =
to Arrow. Arrow wakes up for a few seconds and looks at them.

"Wha?" Arrow=
 asks. Stronghold reaches out and looks into a hole. He sweeps all of Train=
 Wreck's mech fluid into it.

"Sayonara ass!" Blender said. Stronghold jump=
s into the pit of mech fluid and sticks Arrow's head under. Arrow finally s=
tops struggling. Stronghold drops Arrow and Blender kicks him. They both la=
ugh and walk back towards Team Ultima base. They both take out cigars and s=
moke them in satisfaction of their acompishments.

Stranato suddenly grabs =
his chest in pain. Airbomber stares at him. Stranato suddenly starts changi=
ng form. Stranato now looks a little different. Airbomber screams and is al=
so slightly morphed.

"What does this mean?" Airbomber asked Stranato.

"It=
 means that...Train Wreck and Arrow are dead. I can feel it." Stranato said=
.

"What? How?" Airbomber said desperatley.

"It appears our plan didn't wo=
rk out." Stranato said.

"Plan?" Airbomber replies.

"Yes, none of the Radi=
ocns were reprogrammed really." Stranato replied sadly.

"Then why are Trai=
n Wreck and Arrow dead?" Airbomber asked.

"They were killed...by Stronghol=
d and Blender." Stranato replied sadly.

"WHAT! Our friends killed out frie=
nds!?!?!?!?" Airbomber said.

"Sadly, yes, they betrayed us, but out friend=
s, now live on in us." Stranato said.

"Huh?" Airbomber questioned.

"Their=
 sparks joined in with ours, we now posses their power, the Radicons are no=
 more, let us say goodbye to our good friends as their spiritual sparks hea=
d toward the Matrix. Airbomber and Stranato stood in silence, saluting Arro=
w and Train Wreck. Airbomber puts his arm around Infectra and cries. Strana=
to also cannot keep character, and is crying as well.

Gangon starts to fad=
e away, realizing he isn't wanted anymore.

Lightmare's spark floats slowly=
 toward the Matrix, unsure if she wants to go there. Arrow and Train Wreck'=
s sparks come by. Lightmare's spark notices them. The former Radicons float=
ed into the Matrix. Lightmare's spark lit up and followed them.

Deemos and=
 Inzoola sit there VERY bored. They couldn't believe that nobody was paying=
 attention to them!

"I don't believe this, how can they treat me like this=
!?" Deemos yelled.

"If your bored, we could always go find a spot and...be=
 alone." Inzola said. Deemos just stared coldly. Inzola frowned, she knew D=
eemos felt unimportant, but right now he was making her feel pretty unimpor=
tant, too!

Sinesis is still healing up in the CR Chamber of Team Ultima ba=
se.

Dracona calls Zardus on her comm unit.

"Zardus, this is former Allian=
ce warrior Dracona, I wish to make...an Alliance with the Alliance." She sa=
id.

Plintissa noticed Stronghold and Blender, she and Artist slowly sneaki=
ng up behind them.

Sinister is "Alone" with Blizzard...
